snippet: Fans of basketball can head to Orchard Beach in the Bronx every Saturday and Sunday from mid-June to mid-August for the Hoops in the Sun tournament, which has 50 teams and various youth divisions.
abstract: Hoops in the Sun basketball tournament is held every Saturday and Sunday at Orchard Beach in the Bronx from mid-June to Mid August; tournament, founded 15 years ago, has grown to 50 teams and various youth divisions since its humble beginnings (Series: Summer In...).
lead_paragraph: Fans of basketball can head to Orchard Beach in the Bronx every Saturday and Sunday from mid-June to mid-August for the Hoops in the Sun tournament, which has 50 teams and various youth divisions.
